title: Test harness called mladmin abort on 6.0 Linux 64 RH6 machine in test estimate_cap.xml, as following XQuery did not finished in 30 minutes, which usually get completed in the said time.
description:
Test harness called mladmin abort on 6.0 Linux 64 RH6 machine in test estimate_cap.xml, as following XQuery did not finished in 30 minutes, which usually get completed in the said time.

Test name :  estimate_cap.xml
Machine name : rh6-intel64-51-test-2
ML Version : 20130116
Path to Error Log : /space/builder/builds/linux64/b6_0/logs.20130116.0/reg-results/ErrorLog.txt
